啞.definition: mute; dumb; incapable of speech; (of a voice) hoarse; husky; (bound form) (of a bullet, bomb etc) dud

啞口無言.definition: dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless; at a loss for words

啞巴吃黃蓮.definition: no choice but to suffer in silence (idiom); also written 啞巴吃黃連|哑巴吃黄连; (often precedes 有苦說不出|有苦说不出[you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1])

啞巴吃黃連.definition: no choice but to suffer in silence (idiom); also written 啞巴吃黃蓮|哑巴吃黄莲; (often precedes 有苦說不出|有苦说不出[you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1])

啞巴吃黃連，有苦說不出.pinyin: ya3 ba5 chi1 huang2 lian2 , you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1
啞巴吃黃連，有苦說不出.definition: to be forced to suffer in silence (idiom); unable to speak of one's bitter suffering; sometimes written 啞子吃黃連，有苦說不出|哑子吃黄连，有苦说不出

啞巴虧.definition: pent-up unspoken grievances; suffering not willingly or possibly spoken of

啞然失笑.definition: to laugh involuntarily; Taiwan pr. [e4 ran2 shi1 xiao4]

啞鼓.definition: drum practice pad (music); a practice drum (music)
